commit.message: Feat(Java): Add common provider config retrieval logic to ProviderCallbackHandler
Implement high level callback event handling for Black Duck
Feat(Java): Implement Black Duck issue requests
Feat(Java): Create workaround issue lookup url for Black Duck issue handling

nodes.bodyText: This is slightly concerning to me as we're making assumptions here and assume these URLs won't change. Is there no concrete way for us to get this issues url from Blackduck?

commit.message: Fix(Java): Handle media type in Black Duck issue requests
Refactor(Java): Replace string literal http headers with constants

nodes.bodyText:
I would love some variable name suggestions here.

channelDestination represents the location that the channel posted to (e.g. name="IssueKey", value="JIRA-123", url= "https://jira/browse/JIRA-123").
operation is currently tightly coupled to IssueOperation, but we might want to change that.
channelActionSummary represents a summary of the channel message (e.g. the Jira issue summary).

commit.message: Fix(Java): Add missing log message in ProviderCoallbackHandler
